name: Trump: Make Murica Great Again
description:
Play through 10 minigames to beat your record. Feel like a real leader and take on a real challenge as the game speeds up.

Gameplay include:
-pressing lots of fancy red buttons,
-winning elections,
-flying to distant planets,
-moving into your new home,
and much more

DISCLAIMER:
The game is satirical and for humor purposes only and is not to be taken seriously. All characters portrayed in this game are entirely fictional.
